entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10: The Bible as History

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10: The Bible as History
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 10 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œThe Bible as Historyâ€. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 30 to June 5, 2020.
Reading: 1 Samuel 17, Isa. 36:1â€“3, Isa. 37:14â€“38, Daniel 1, Daniel 5, Matt. 26:57â€“67, Heb. 11:1â€“40.
Memory Text: â€œI am the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egyptâ€ (Exod. 20:2 [also Deut. 5:6], NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - "David, Solomon, and the Monarchy" Monday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œIsaiah, Hezekiah, and Sennacheribâ€ Tuesday (Danny Shelton) - â€œDaniel, Nebuchadnezzar, and Babylonâ€ Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - â€œThe Historical Jesusâ€ Thursday (Ryan Day) - â€œFaith and Historyâ€

entry.title: Weapon of Warfare | Help is Coming (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Weapon of Warfare | Help is Coming (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Just suppose Jesus came today. Would you be ready to meet Him? Which side are you on? Are you fighting for God or against Him. It can only be one or the other. The Bible is clear, there is no middle ground. Christians have fought spiritual battles since sin entered this world. Do you have a weapon to fight in this spiritual war? All of Heaven is fighting to save as many people as possible.The Bible says an angel of the Lord is around those who love and obey Him. The choice is yours. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

This week's lesson is for May 23 to May 29, 2020.

entry.title: Coronavirus Aftermath | God's People at Risk (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Coronavirus Aftermath | God's People at Risk (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with John Lomacang. What is the Coronavirus laying the foundation for? Are Christian's at risk of loosing their religious freedom? The books of Matthew and Revelation reveal the prophetic outlook for God's people. We are living in the end times of earth's history and soon the beast of Revelation 13 will speak like a dragon. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor John Lomacang.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 7 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Language, Text, and Context". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 9 to May 15, 2020.
Reading: Deut. 32:46, 47; 1 Kings 3:6; Num. 6:24â€“26; Gen. 1:26, 27; Gen. 2:15â€“23; Gen. 15:1â€“5.
Memory Text: â€œ â€˜Take this Book of the Law, and put it beside the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, that it may be there as a witness against youâ€™ â€ (Deuteronomy 31:26, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) - â€œUnderstanding the Scripturesâ€ Monday (John Lomacang) - â€œWords and Their Meaningsâ€ Tuesday (John Dinzey) - â€œRepetition, Word Patterns, and Meaningâ€ Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œTexts and Contextsâ€ Thursday (Jill Morikone) - â€œBooks and Their Messageâ€
